p: Territory of Washington, County of Thurston ) SS.
In the District Court of the Second Judicial District of Washington Territory, holding terms at Olympia, for the Counties of Thurston, Lewis, Mason and Chehalis.
Territory of Washington Plaintiff vs. Sarah Elizabeth Seibert, Defendant} Case No 1 Poligamy Judgment

And now the said Sarah Elizabeth Seibert is brought to the bar of the Court here, and being asked if she have any legal Cause to show why judgment should not be examinedagainst her. Say nothing unless as she before has said. Whereupon all word singular the premises being seen, and by the Judge of the Court here fully understood. It is considered by the Court that the said Sarah Elizabeth Seibert
be imprisoned in the penitentiary at hard labor for the term of Eighteen months and that she pay the costs of this action. And it appearing to the Court that there is no penitentiary within the Territory or other provided for the reception of prisoner It is Ordered that the said Sarah Elizabeth Seibert be confined in the County Jail of Thurston County till discharged or removed according to law.

I, R.G. O'Brien, do certify that I am the Clerk of the District Court of the Second Judicial District of Washington Territory, holding terms at Olympia, and do hereby certify that the writings annexed to this certificate are true copies of their respective originals, on file and remaining of record in my office.
In witness whereof, I have hereunto put my hand and affixed the seal of said Court at my office at Olympia, this 6th day of January A.D. 1879
